properties.entry: select * from trade_symbol ts where ts.symbol = :psymbol
select * from trade_symbol ts where ts.enabled = 1 and ts.trade_symbol_id = :symbolId

select ts.symbol, th.price_time,th.high_price, th.low_price, th.open_price from trade_symbol_price_historic th, trade_symbol ts where th.trade_symbol_id = ts.trade_symbol_id and ts.trade_symbol_id = :symbolId and th.interval_period = :intervalPeriod

select ts.symbol, th.price_time,th.high_price, th.low_price, th.open_price from trade_symbol_price_historic th, trade_symbol ts where th.trade_symbol_id = ts.trade_symbol_id and ts.trade_symbol_id = :symbolId and price_time between :fromDate and :toDate
select * from trade_symbol ts where ts.enabled = 1 order by trade_symbol_id
select ts.* from trade_symbol ts, app_user au where ts.enabled = 1 and au.id = :userId and au.preferred_region = :prefRegion and ts.trade_symbol_id = any(au.favourites)
